id: Simple Workout and Gym Tracker for Notion
name: Simple Workout and Gym Tracker for Notion
description: What do you get? A Simple Workout | Gym Log | Fitness Diary for Notion. Keep track of your workout progress, repetitions and weight lifted. The simple and clean design of this template makes it easy to track your progress!How to copy a Notion template to your workspace?Just click on Duplicate in the upper right corner of the Notion Screen.The template will be automatically transferred to your Notion Workspace.
features: The template will be automatically transferred to your Notion Workspace.
